title: Frodo, Old Bilbo's Heir (1R289)
text:
Set:	The Fellowship of the Ring
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Shire
Twilight:	0
Card Type:	Companion • Hobbit
Strength:	3
Vitality:	4
Resistance:	10
Signet:	Gandalf
Game Text:	Ring-bearer (resistance 10). At the start of each of your turns, you may heal a Hobbit ally.
Lore:	”'But be that as it may, Mr. Frodo is as nice a young hobbit as you could wish to meet.'”
Rarity:	R
